A Invoice statistics
B Manual payment statistics
C Automatic payment statistics
D Unspecified payment statistics
E Update debtor statistics
F Limit statistics
for 701
for 703
for 706

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(count(*) as decimal (9,0)), cast(sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_INVO_NO > 0 and (BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :3 or BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :4) and BPIV_INVOICETYPE = 3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select cast(count(*) as decimal (9,0))from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_INVO_NO > 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select count(*)
from :1/BTPC
where BTPC_BTCH_ID=:2 and BTPC_LINENO=1
select cast(count(*) as decimal (9,0))from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_INVO_NO > 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, cast (count(*) as decimal (9,0)),cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and (INVO_PAYMENTCODE = :2 or INVO_PAYMENTCODE =:3) and INVO_INVDATE< ':4' group by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
